mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_older ( AssessmentID, AssessmentDate, AssessmentReason, userID, Name, Gender, BirthDate, IDCard, SocialSecurityCard, Ethnicity, EducationLevel, Religion, MaritalStatus, LivingSituation, PaymentMethod, IncomeSource, DementiaLevel, MentalIllness, ChronicDiseases, FallIncidents, LostIncidents, ChokingIncidents, SuicideIncidents, OtherIncidents ) VALUES ( #{AssessmentID}, #{AssessmentDate}, #{AssessmentReason}, #{userID}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{idCard}, #{socialSecurityCard}, #{ethnicity}, #{educationLevel}, #{religion}, #{maritalStatus}, #{livingSituation}, #{paymentMethod}, #{incomeSource}, #{dementiaLevel}, #{mentalIllness}, #{chronicDiseases}, #{fallIncidents}, #{lostIncidents}, #{chokingIncidents}, #{suicideIncidents}, #{otherIncidents} )
